about_the_game:
ABOUT
Student Kelly is attending university but has no interest in her education. She lives with her wealthy mother and has everything except knowledge at university. That's why she's trying to befriend you, the straight-A student. Help Kelly prepare for her exams, but don't forget that Kelly will want to repay you for your help using other methods.

After you enter Kelly's house, a new problem will arise - her mother, who is also interested in you. Try to prepare Kelly for her chemistry exams, but at the same time, resist the temptations of this household.

FEATURES
• Around 2 hours of Gameplay
• Hot scenes
• Non-linearity of the plot

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, general mature content, sexual acts. 

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

Student Kelly is attending university but has no interest in her education. She lives with her wealthy mother and has everything except knowledge at university. That's why she's trying to befriend you, the straight-A student. Help Kelly prepare for her exams, but don't forget that Kelly will want to repay you for your help using other methods.

After you enter Kelly's house, a new problem will arise - her mother, who is also interested in you. Try to prepare Kelly for her chemistry exams, but at the same time, resist the temptations of this household.

name: Hot Homework Help

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2, or WebGL
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Kelly is an uninterested university student living with a wealthy mother, lacking knowledge. She's trying to befriend you, the top student. Assist her with exams, but remember she may want to repay you differently.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
